properties.name: Westlake Hills Estate
properties.tagline: Panoramic Hill Country Views from Every Room
properties.description: Experience the ultimate in luxury living at this stunning Westlake Hills estate. This 6-bedroom home offers panoramic Hill Country views from every room, a resort-style infinity pool, and mature live oak trees throughout the property. A rare opportunity to own one of Westlake's most prestigious addresses.
properties.shortDescription: 6BR estate with Hill Country views, infinity pool, and live oak canopy

gallery.alt: Open living room with Hill Country views

seo.title: Westlake Hills Estate | Luxury Home Sold in Austin
seo.description: Luxury 6BR estate with Hill Country views, infinity pool, and live oak canopy in Westlake Hills, Austin TX. Sold for $2,900,000. View our portfolio.

properties.name: Tarrytown Craftsman
properties.tagline: Classic Elegance in Austin's Most Coveted Neighborhood
properties.description: This beautifully restored Craftsman in the heart of Tarrytown blends period charm with modern luxury. Steps from Lake Austin and the Hike-and-Bike Trail, this 5-bedroom home features original hardwood floors, a chef's kitchen, and a private backyard oasis with mature pecan trees.
properties.shortDescription: 5BR restored Craftsman near Lake Austin with chef's kitchen

gallery.alt: Backyard with pool and pecan trees

seo.title: Tarrytown Craftsman | Classic Austin Home Sold
seo.description: Restored 5BR Craftsman with pool and mature trees near Lake Austin in Tarrytown, Austin TX. Sold for $2,250,000. View our portfolio.

properties.name: Barton Creek Lakefront
properties.tagline: Where Luxury Meets the Water
properties.description: A breathtaking lakefront estate in the exclusive Barton Creek community. This 5-bedroom modern Mediterranean features a private boat dock, panoramic lake views, and resort-style outdoor living. Membership to Barton Creek Country Club available with purchase.

Private boat dock on Lake Austin

properties.name: The Austonian Penthouse
properties.tagline: Elevated Luxury Above the Austin Skyline
properties.description: Perched atop one of Austin's most iconic towers, this 3-bedroom penthouse offers unobstructed 270-degree views of Lady Bird Lake, the Capitol, and the Hill Country. Floor-to-ceiling windows, a private terrace, and access to world-class amenities define this exceptional residence.
properties.shortDescription: 3BR penthouse with panoramic skyline views and resort amenities
